directions.step:
1. USE 10 LB OR 2- 5 LB PG BANANA CAKE MIX. PREPARE ACCORDING TO INSTRUCTIONS ON CONTAINER.
2. SEE RECIPE CARD G-G-3 GUIDLINES FOR USING CAKE MIXES, FOR MORE DETAILED INSTRUCTIONS.
3. COOL; FROST IF DESIRED. CUT 6 BY 9.
Recipe Number: G00601
SERVING SIZE: 1 PIECE
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
